welcome_message_body: Welcome to Quzhou, China! Get ready to explore this charming city known for its rich history, beautiful landscapes, and welcoming locals. We hope you enjoy your time here and discover all that Quzhou has to offer.

restaurants.name: KFC (肯德基)
restaurants.description: KFC (肯德基) is a fast food restaurant located in the city.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
